title: This is for you apes at riot

embed.description: Twitch is the world's leading video platform and community for gamers.

body: I hope riot ceo will see this and hopefully wake up and think to himself. THIS GAME IS TRASH AND I NEED TO FIX,RIGHT NOW,NOT TOMORROW,RIGHT NOW.Cancerous company smh

replies.body: For what dude,he is saying the truth.Just think about how trash rioters have become at managing this game!

> [{quoted}](name=KatScriptt,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ihcb3KIo,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-06-02T15:29:44.648+0000)
>
> For what dude,he is saying the truth.Just think about how trash rioters have become at managing this game!

he didnt really say anything in that clip. i dont even know what hes talking about.

all i see is a manchild throwing a tantrum. do you want this to represent your community?
Skip to the end of the stream
You need help,you actually dont realise how shit this game has become
Bringing up a vague opinion while swearing at your audience and using the clip of a raging manchild without self-control as proof for your statement. gj
Wannabe fanboy probably, the game is fine & this guy needs some serious fucking help... god...
Riot think because people are still playing the game (because its Addictive) that people are happy with thet state of the game.
The screeching T1 fanboys coming again! Hide your kids boys!
At 11:00 angry manchild arrested for hitting ppl that were "working for Riot".
